programme.desc: When a student from Aurora's true crime literature class is found murdered outside the diner where she works, Aurora takes it upon herself to figure out the real culprit.

programme.desc: Sophia encourages Dorothy and Stan to pretend they are still married, at least until Sophia's clergyman brother leaves town.

programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean battle over who should host Thanksgiving dinner and feelings get hurt; BJ cooks.

programme.desc: Frasier is chagrined when his father handily and repeatedly beats him at chess.

programme.desc: Frasier and Niles have a courtroom face-off over the question of a wealthy eccentric's sanity.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier becomes attracted to a traffic officer (Jane Kaczmarek) after she pulls him and Roz over for speeding.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: In order to get a syndication deal, Frasier has to help his agent, Bebe, quit smoking.

programme.desc: A priceless vase is destroyed when Sam, Woody and Rebecca cater a party at the chairman of the board's mansion.

programme.desc: Sophia's new boyfriend Rocco robs a bank and makes her an unsuspecting accomplice.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose's new boyfriend Mr. Terrific gets Dorothy a job, but her recommendations get him fired.

programme.title: Love in Paradise
programme.desc: When an actor (Luke Perry) who makes Westerns visits a Montana dude ranch, a woman (Emmanuelle Vaugier) realizes that he's actually a city slicker who knows nothing about being a cowboy.

programme.title: The Baker's Son
programme.desc: Matt's passion transforms his bread from bland to brilliant. However, when the bread loses its magic, the island locals panic and turn to Annie -- Matt's childhood friend and true love -- for help.

programme.title: Love on the Slopes
programme.desc: Alex, a copy editor from New York, is sent to an extreme sports outpost to write a story for a travel writing competition. Cole, a sports enthusiast, reluctantly agrees to be Alex's guide as she faces her fears.

programme.title: A New Year's Resolution
programme.desc: A morning show producer reluctantly becomes the subject of her own program's on-air experiment about her New Year's resolution to agree to every social invitation for a month.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah heads to her uncle's ranch to escape New York and the spotlight from a breakup. Returning home for the first time since her aunt passed, complications arise when Graham, a Hollywood star, arrives at the ranch to prepare for his next film.

programme.title: It's Christmas, Eve
programme.desc: A school superintendent with a knack for turning around schools meets a single father who works as the head of the school's bankrupt music department. As she rediscovers her passion for music, she works to save the dreams of the kids who love music.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne and Roz pose as the wives of the Crane brothers to hoodwink Daphne's now-successful ex-fiance.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Rebecca is furious when Sam spends a weekend on Evan Drake's yacht with another woman.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Frasier, upon hearing horror stories of being tied down to marriage, gets cold feet about his own impending nuptials.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba decides to pursue a career in real estate, and Brock reluctantly allows her to handle the sale of his condo.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Deprived of Van's attention, Cheyenne develops a relationship with the father of her daughter's play date.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Finger-pointing begins when Barbra Jean's new dog goes missing and a psychic tells her someone in the family is to blame.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba enters a beauty pageant for grandmothers, Barbra Jean becomes jealous and sets out to prove she is the true Grandma Hart.

programme.title: The Makeover
programme.desc: To benefit her political agenda, an education consultant (Julia Stiles) tries to transform a beer vendor (David Walton) into a gentleman and a congressional candidate.

programme.title: A Wish Come True
programme.desc: On the night of her 30th birthday, Lindsay Corwin (Megan Park) wishes for all of her past wishes to come true.

programme.title: Autumn Dreams
programme.desc: Years after the annulment of their spontaneous marriage a couple discovers a mistake in the paperwork that means they are still husband and wife.

programme.title: A Greek Recipe for Romance
programme.desc: While visiting her mother in Greece, Abby decides to open a restaurant with a man she just met.

programme.title: Love on the Menu
programme.desc: A popular chef rejects the idea of creating a gourmet frozen food line when the idea is presented by a food executive. But when the restaurant he runs with his wife faces financial problems, he reluctantly makes a deal.

programme.title: Falling for Vermont
programme.desc: A best-selling author who got amnesia as the result of a car accident finds refuge with the local doctor of a small idyllic town in Vermont.

programme.title: Hearts Around the Table: Kiki's Fourth Ingredient
programme.desc: Kiki is overjoyed and then overwhelmed when she agrees to cater a big wedding. She turns to Clay for support. Together, Kiki and Clay prove that the best ingredient is love.
